name: Hand Fishing
description:
New version with more Fish and Shark !
WOW !

Hand-Fishing free Game and Screen-Saver
Easy Fishing Game (*) and Friendly Screensaver on Working table (**): 2 in 1 !

Designed:
• Both Ipad and iPhone.
• Best on iPad on Screen-Saver Mode with scenery natural when you are working at Office (it's Ipad's free time)
• Best on IPhone for playing Fish-Game when you have a free time.
• 100% free.

Playing:
• Easy playing on game, friendly screen on Screen-Saver mode.
• Player must had 30 fish before run Next level. Use multi finger-tape and moving to get more Mini-Fish in Fist level, and next...

Screen-Saver Mode:
• After 1 minute (default), application change to Screen-Saver mode. It's can be change to 2,3 or 5 minute on Setting. Black-Screen in screen-saver mode can be set ON or OFF (nothing change).
